title: Alexis Teikoku Kouryuuki
description:
The brave tale of the peerless Great Emperor Leonard the First was evaluated as a universal truth. 
However, in his younger days, before he managed to unify the continent, he was a boorish and clumsy young man, he got his homeland taken away from him and was branded with the infamous name of “Nosferatu”. This is the story of a great counterattack, a great revolt.

Leonard vowed to recover his homeland and truly became a mighty warrior. Several great generals, sages, talented women and geniuses comparable to gods and demons got attracted to the single-minded Leonard and congregated around him. Eventually, they became a great force able to engulf their depraved fatherland and contended against rival countries.
